snippet: The Republican National Committee (RNC) on Friday called for the repeal of a U.S. anti-tax-evasion law, siding with big banks, libertarians and American expatriates that have criticized the Obama administration statute....

headline.print_headline: Republicans Bash U.S. Law Targeting Offshore Tax Dodgers
headline.main: Republicans Bash U.S. Law Targeting Offshore Tax Dodgers

lead_paragraph: The Republican National Committee (RNC) on Friday called for the repeal of a U.S. anti-tax-evasion law, siding with big banks, libertarians and American expatriates that have criticized the Obama administration statute.
